summary: The diff implements both requirements: REQ-16 (global white and yellow color theme) is fully implemented in index.css and tailwind.config.js with white backgrounds, yellow accents, and dark mode support. REQ-17 (colored cards across all pages) is comprehensively implemented across all 8 pages (Home, About, Services, GCC, Industries, Insights, Careers, Contact) using bg-card-yellow, bg-card-amber, bg-card-warm, and bg-card-light utility classes.
